meanings.sent1: Lack of exercise weakens muscles over time.
meanings.sent2: Stress weakens the immune system's ability to fight off infections.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy weakens your willpower to resist more sweets.
meanings.sent4: Constant exposure to negativity weakens the spirit like a relentless storm.
meanings.sent5: The relentless heat of the sun weakens the ice until it cracks and breaks.

meanings.definition: To diminish in strength or intensity.
meanings.sent1: Skipping meals weakens your body's energy levels.
meanings.sent2: The storm weakens as it moves further away from the coast.
meanings.sent3: The magician's spell weakens with each passing minute, losing its power.
meanings.sent4: The resolve of the team weakens under the pressure of the opposing players.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers weakens as the petals begin to wither and fall.
